metadata.dc:title: UFOs & Alcohol
metadata.dc:creator: Marc Dietrichstein (https://orcid.org/0000-0003-4890-3498)
Markus Neumeyer (https://orcid.org/0000-0002-4081-0716)
metadata.dc:subject: Correlation of alcohol consumtion and UFO sightings
metadata.dc:description: Automated tool that invastigates and computes the correlation between the average alcohol consumption and the amount of UFO sightings in the United States of America since 1960.
